lead_paragraph: Like Ben Roethlisberger, the Lakers’ Kobe Bryant once fell from admired star to reviled lout. The only debate around Bryant these days is whether he can win another N.B.A. title.
snippet: Like Ben Roethlisberger, the Lakers’ Kobe Bryant once fell from admired star to reviled lout. The only debate around Bryant these days is whether he can win another N.B.A. title.
